```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(rio)
library(readr)
library(haven)

library(foreign)

```

```{r}
star <- read.csv(here("data", "star.csv"))


```
```{r}
view(star)
```
```{r, Commit_3, results="asis"}

star %>% 
	group_by(sex, frl) %>%
	summarize(math_mean = mean(tmathss),
					math_sd = sd(tmathss),
					rdg_mean = mean(treadss),
					rdg_sd = sd(treadss)) %>%
	knitr::kable(digits = 2,
		booktabs = TRUE)


```
